Package cp213

Class Snack

java.lang.Object
cp213.VendModel
cp213.Snack
public class Snack
extends VendModel
Snacks model. Contains the code for creating a snack, as well as processing the cost of a group of selected snacks.
Version:
2021-03-19
Author:
Brian Ha

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class cp213.VendModel

    DIME, DOLLAR, FIVEBILL, NICKEL, QUARTER, TENBILL, TOONIE

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Snack()
    Snack constructor, instantiates a snack object, can be either a chocolate, chip, gum, or drink, based on a random index All images of each snack category is randomized as well

  • Method Summary

    • orderProcess

      public double orderProcess​(java.lang.String order, Snack[][] snackBag, java.lang.String amount, VendModel model)
      Processes the order created by the user to calculate the checkout cost of the order Also lists any snacks selected as taken
      Parameters:
      String - order - selection string, Snack[][] snackBag - 2d array of snacks in the machine, String amount - existing cost, VendModel model - model
      Returns:
      double cost - the total cost of the order

    • reset

      public void reset​(java.lang.String order, Snack[][] snackBag, VendModel model)
      Looks through the vending machine inventory to 'put back' any snacks that may have been selected by the user due to a cancellation of an order
      Parameters:
      String - order - selection string, Snack[][] snackBag - 2d array of snacks in the machine, VendModel model - model

    • snackPresent

      public boolean snackPresent​(Snack[][] snackBag, java.lang.String slot)
      Checks to see if a certain snack is taken or not
      Parameters:
      String - order - selection string, Snack[][] snackBag - 2d array of snacks in the machine, VendModel model - model
      Returns:
      boolean present - true if not taken, false if taken

    • clearChosen

      public void clearChosen​(VendModel model, Snack[][] snacks, javax.swing.JLabel[][] image)
      Looks through the vending machine inventory to 'put back' any snacks that may have been selected by the user due to a cancellation of an order
      Parameters:
      String - order - VendModel model - model, Snack[][] snacks - 2d array of snacks in the machine, JLable[][] image - 2d list of snack images for machine inventory display
